Text: I can't get any of these 720p the killing torrents to download the normal way. Neither Vuze nor utorrent can connect to any trackers.The only way I can get it to work is by using the magnet link and the download is painfully slow: less than 20 KB/sec. At this rate it will take nearly 24 hours to download a 1 gig file.
I wish for some single links...
